name: Loek Am Portal
text:
Whenever you flood a card, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield and each opponent mills three cards.
{g}{g}{g}{g}{g}: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature and land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. The next flood ability you activate this turn costs {2} less.
